Room.Name: On a woodland trail
Room.Description: You stand on a narrow but well kept trail through the thick woods. The sounds of animals resound all about you and leaves rustle softly in the wind. Above you the high tree top canopy blocks out much of the sun, making the region seem darker than it really is. A dirt path heads westwards into the region.

Room.Name: On a woodland trail
Room.Description: You stand on a narrow but well kept trail through the thick woods. The sounds of animals resound all about you and leaves rustle softly in the wind. Above you the high tree top canopy blocks out much of the sun, making the region seem darker than it really is. The dirt pathway heads west and east.

Room.Name: On a woodland trail
Room.Description: You stand on a narrow but well kept trail through the thick woods. The sounds of animals resound all about you and leaves rustle softly in the wind. Above you the high tree top canopy blocks out much of the sun, making the region seem darker than it really is. The dirt path turns north and east.

Room.Name: On a woodland trail
Room.Description: You stand on a narrow but well kept trail through the thick woods. The sounds of animals resound all about you and leaves rustle softly in the wind. Above you the high tree top canopy blocks out much of the sun, making the region seem darker than it really is. The dirt path continues north and south.

Room.Name: On a woodland trail
Room.Description: You stand on a narrow but well kept trail through the thick woods. The sounds of animals resound all about you and leaves rustle softly in the wind. Above you the high tree top canopy blocks out much of the sun, making the region seem darker than it really is. The dirt path continues north where it curves west, and south.

Room.Name: A turn in the woodland trail
Room.Description: The trail curves west and south here. The droppings of animals and the signs of frequent passage by them is an indication that this region is safer than the dark shadows covering it suggest.

Room.Name: On a woodland trail
Room.Description: You stand on a narrow but well kept trail through the thick woods. The sounds of animals resound all about you and leaves rustle softly in the wind. Above you the high tree top canopy blocks out much of the sun, making the region seem darker than it really is. The dirt path continues north and east.

Room.Name: A T-junction in the woodland trail
Room.Description: You stand on a narrow but well kept trail through the thick woods. The sounds of animals resound all about you and leaves rustle softly in the wind. Above you the high tree top canopy blocks out much of the sun, making the region seem darker than it really is. To the west you can hear faint sounds of running water and the noises of people. The path continues north and south.

Room.Name: On a woodland trail
Room.Description: You stand on a narrow but well kept trail through the thick woods. The sounds of animals resound all about you and leaves rustle softly in the wind. Above you the high tree top canopy blocks out much of the sun, making the region seem darker than it really is. The path continues north and south.

Room.Name: On a woodland trail
Room.Description: You stand on a narrow but well kept trail through the thick woods. The sounds of animals resound all about you and leaves rustle softly in the wind. Above you the high tree top canopy blocks out much of the sun, making the region seem darker than it really is. To the west the path heads onto a small bridge over a river, while to the south it leads off into the woods.

Room.Name: On a small wooden bridge
Room.Description: You are standing on a small bridge leading across a deep running river. Loud gurgling water rushes beneath you and froths up along the river banks. Off to the south you can make out a small lake where the river ends, and to the west you can see buildings of some sort nestled between this bridge and one further on.

Room.Name: Southern outskirts of Greenleaf dale
Room.Description: You stand amidst a small cluster of buildings between two bridges. The woods around you are thick and well kept, showing very little sign of human ruin that normally accompanies human settlement. To the north you can see a small house and south is what looks like a guard outpost. The path heads east across a bridge and westwards into Greenleaf dale.

Room.Name: Southern outskirts of Greenleaf dale
Room.Description: You stand amidst a small cluster of buildings between two bridges. The woods around you are thick and well kept, showing very little sign of human ruin that normally accompanies human settlement. To the north you can see a small house. The path heads east and west amongst the buildings.

Room.Name: Southern outskirts of Greenleaf dale
Room.Description: You stand amidst a small cluster of buildings between two bridges. The woods around you are thick and well kept, showing very little sign of human ruin that normally accompanies human settlement. To the north and south you can see a pair of small houses. The path heads east amidst the buildings, and west across a small bridge.

Room.Name: On a small wooden bridge
Room.Description: You are standing on a small bridge leading across a deep running river. Loud gurgling water rushes beneath you and froths up along the river banks. To the north you can make out a town of somesort, while to the east is a bridge leading to a small cluster of buildings. The path heads east over the bridge, and west towards the township.

Room.Name: On a the woodland trail
Room.Description: You stand on a well travelled dirt pathway through a thick forest. The region is dark from the choking tree canopy but it is a dark that is comforting rather than menacing. To the east is a small bridge leading to some building, while the path heads west to a bend.

Room.Name: A bend in the woodland path
Room.Description: You are at a sharp bend in the path through the woods. It heads north towards some buildings and more cultivated land, or east into the woods and a small bridge further off.

Room.Name: A path in the woodlands
Room.Description: You are on a path through some thick woodland forest. Although the region is dark from the overhanging tree cover you can still make out the well used path with little problem. Northwards you can see buildings, while south the path heads into a bend.

Room.Name: At the entrance to Greenleaf dale
Room.Description: You stand at the entrance to a small township. The thick and dark forest around it seems strangely comforting, like a protective shell from the rest of the harsh world. To the east you can see a small house of some local resident. The path heads northwards into the township or south into the surrounding forests.

Exit.Description: On a path through the woodlands.

Room.Name: A pathway through the township
Room.Description: You are walking on a well kept and regularly frequented path through the small township here in the forest. The air is fresh and there is an unexplainable feeling of peace from all around. To the east and west lie small houses, while the path leads north to a common square and south out of the town.

Room.Name: At a common square in the township
Room.Description: You stand within a large open gravel square set aside for the town's way-point. Signs and small makeshift stalls line the intersecting paths as people try to make the most of the busy and industrius crossing. The path continues north and south through the township. Eastwards you can see the majority of the town buildings and what looks like a market place, and west appears to head off into some fields.

Room.Name: A pathway through the township
Room.Description: You are walking on a well kept and regularly frequented path through the small township here in the forest. The air is fresh and there is an unexplainable feeling of peace from all around. To the east lies a small house, while the path leads north out of the town or south to a common square.

Room.Name: A pathway through the township
Room.Description: You are walking on a well kept and regularly frequented path through the small township here in the forest. The air is fresh and there is an unexplainable feeling of peace from all around. To the east and west lie small houses, while the path leads north out of the town, or south into it.

Room.Name: A pathway through the township
Room.Description: You are walking on a well kept and regularly frequented path through the small township here in the forest. The air is fresh and there is an unexplainable feeling of peace from all around. For some reason the path is not quite so well travelled this far north of the town. The path leads north out of the town, or south into it.

Room.Name: The northern outskirts of Greenleaf dale
Room.Description: You stand on a small pathway at the northern end of a small township. Around you the forest is thick and dark, covered in flickering shadows. The pathway here is not too well defined and shows an evident lack of use. The path leads east out of the town, or south towards it.

Room.Name: The northern outskirts of Greenleaf dale
Room.Description: You stand on a small pathway at the northern end of a small township. Around you the forest is thick and dark, covered in flickering shadows. The pathway here is not too well defined and shows an evident lack of use. The path leads east and west.

Room.Name: The northern outskirts of Greenleaf dale
Room.Description: You stand on a small pathway at the northern end of a small township. Around you the forest is thick and dark, covered in flickering shadows. The pathway here is not too well defined and shows an evident lack of use. The path leads west back to the town, or north towards a small cluster of isolated buildings.

Room.Name: The northern outskirts of Greenleaf dale
Room.Description: You stand on a small pathway at the northern end of a small township. Around you the forest is thick and dark, covered in flickering shadows. The pathway here is not too well defined and shows an evident lack of use. To the east and west are small buildings, while the path itself leads north and south.

Room.Name: The northern outskirts of Greenleaf dale
Room.Description: You stand on a small pathway at the northern end of a small township. Around you the forest is thick and dark, covered in flickering shadows. The pathway here is not too well defined and shows an evident lack of use. To the east and west are small buildings, while the path itself leads north and south.

Room.Name: The northern outskirts of Greenleaf dale
Room.Description: You stand at the very northern end of what could possibly be called the township. Even here there is more forest than civilised land and the trees seem darker and more intimidating than elsewhere. To the south lies a small cluster of buildings, and eastwards the forest grows thicker and darker.

Room.Name: A pathway through the township
Room.Description: You stand upon a well kept gravel path. Around you the thick forest provides a comforting cover from the rest of the world, and soft noises of animals can be heard. To the north is a small building labelled 'customs'. East of here the path heads towards the main township, while west there is a large common square.

Room.Name: Within the main township
Room.Description: You stand amongst small buildings in the township of Greenleaf dale. Trees line the pathway all around you and it almost seems like you are within a forest rather than a town. To the north and south are small houses, and to the east there is a large open market place. West leads back out of the main township.

Room.Name: NW corner of the Dale market
Room.Description: You stand within a bustling market place filled with the sounds of commerce and everyday living. Smells of sweet meets and bread waft through the air and music can be heard from somewhere nearby. To the north there is a baker's shop from which the smells of fresh bread are coming. West is a small tavern filled with drunken laughter.

Room.Name: Northern end of the Dale Market
Room.Description: You stand within a bustling market place filled with the sounds of commerce and everyday living. Smells of sweet meets and bread waft through the air and music can be heard from somewhere nearby. To the north is a large inn filled with happy partons.

Room.Name: NE corner of the Dale market
Room.Description: You stand within a bustling market place filled with the sounds of commerce and everyday living. Smells of sweet meets and bread waft through the air and music can be heard from somewhere nearby. North of here is a loud armorer's shop and east is an accompanying weaponsmith.

Room.Name: Western side of the Dale market
Room.Description: You stand within a bustling market place filled with the sounds of commerce and everyday living. Smells of sweet meets and bread waft through the air and music can be heard from somewhere nearby. The market spreads out to the north, east and south. A small pathway heads west out of the main market.

Room.Name: Centre of the Dale market
Room.Description: You stand within the centre of the township's main trading square. All around you people are busy buying goods and talking to neighbours. Loud sounds and strong smells greet you at every turn and assault your senses. All around you the market spreads out.

Room.Name: Eastern side of the Dale market
Room.Description: You stand within a bustling market place filled with the sounds of commerce and everyday living. Smells of sweet meets and bread waft through the air and music can be heard from somewhere nearby. The market heads off to the north,south and west. To the east lies a wide path heading towards what look like houses.

Room.Name: SW corner of the Dale market
Room.Description: You stand within a bustling market place filled with the sounds of commerce and everyday living. Smells of sweet meets and bread waft through the air and music can be heard from somewhere nearby. To the south is a strange shop with a sign bearing a crescent moon. West is a shop selling forest clothing for the local hunters and trappers.

Room.Name: Southern end of the Dale market
Room.Description: You stand within a bustling market place filled with the sounds of commerce and everyday living. Smells of sweet meets and bread waft through the air and music can be heard from somewhere nearby.

Room.Name: SE corner of the Dale market
Room.Description: You stand within a bustling market place filled with the sounds of commerce and everyday living. Smells of sweet meets and bread waft through the air and music can be heard from somewhere nearby. You can see a bank to the east and a busy clothing shop to the south.

Room.Name: On a pathway amidst the Dale community
Room.Description: You are standing upon a wide gravel pathway through the eastern side of the forest township. Thick woods surround you in a strangely comforting cover, and animals can occasionally be seen loitering near the edges of the town. To the north is a small house, and more can be seen in clusters to the east. West of here is what looks like a market place.

Room.Name: On a pathway amidst the Dale community
Room.Description: You are standing upon a wide gravel pathway through the eastern side of the forest township. Thick woods surround you in a strangely comforting cover, and animals can occasionally be seen loitering near the edges of the town. To the north and south are some small houses, and to the east are clusters of more houses.

Room.Name: On a pathway amidst the Dale community
Room.Description: You are standing upon a wide gravel pathway through the eastern side of the forest township. Thick woods surround you in a strangely comforting cover, and animals can occasionally be seen loitering near the edges of the town. To the north is a guard headquarters and south is a small house. The pathway heads east and west.

Room.Name: End of the township
Room.Description: You are standing at the eastern edge of the Greenleaf dale community. Thick woods surround you and enclose the buildings in a smothering embrace. A large temple has been erected to the north, and south is a grand house of some regional lord. The path heads back west to a large cluster of common houses.

Room.Name: Foyer of the Lord's Manor
Room.Description: You stand within a rich and elegant house. The walls are solid and even this close to the main dale market you can barely hear anything outside the house. A staircase heads up into the house, and a door opens out north to the dale's main streets.

Room.Name: In a large house
Room.Description: You stand in the house of a very rich, very powerful member of the dale community. The furnishings are the finest in the region and the food that has been laid out on the table is superbly prepared. A staircase leads down and a door leads east. To the west the house opens out onto a balcony.

Room.Name: Inside the temple of Sun
Room.Description: You are at the entrance to a fine, well built temple. Symbols of sun and prosperity have been carved into the walls, along with markings to drive away evil spirits and curses. To the east is a small alcove, while the main temple heads north to the altar room.

Room.Name: The altar room
Room.Description: This is where the dale community gathers to worship. The room is plain and nodescript, holding to the value of humility. There are doors to the east and west.

Room.Name: The Green Fletcher's Tavern
Room.Description: The tavern is noisy and messy. It looks like much of what is served here ends up on the floor rather than in the customer's stomachs. To the east lies the dale market square.

Room.Name: The Baker's Delight
Room.Description: This bakery has the warm smell of fresh bread and other savoury delights. Rows of cakes also line the service table and make your mouth water. To the south lies the dale market square.

Room.Name: The Shadowdale Armory
Room.Description: The room is noisy, smelly and hot. A typical armory if ever you've seen one. Yet this one seems somewhat more professional than the regular midgaard run of the mill blackmsith.

Room.Name: The Worthy Weapons shop
Room.Description: The smell of burning metals and hot coals assaults you as you enter this shop. The place is very well set up, however, and looks quite professional.

Room.Name: The Dale Bank
Room.Description: This branch of the Orthosi banks is small and seems a little unsafe to be holding such large sums of money. Maybe the magical wards placed around it by the local archmagi have something to do with it's security.

Room.Name: Wear 'N Tear
Room.Description: This shop is in disarry. It seems to be newly opened and has little stock of interest right now. Perhaps in time it will get more organised and open.

Room.Name: The Crescent Moon
Room.Description: You find yourself standing in a weird and cluttered little shop. Odds and ends of all sorts lie around the room, most of which look quite useless. But maybe there is one or two things which may actually have some use..

Room.Name: Forest Wear
Room.Description: You are standing within a building that has been made, quite convincingly, to look like a forest cabin. It seems to be a place where local trappers and hunters can come to buy clothing to help them find their prey a little easier. The clothes themselves seem a little flimsy for fighting in, but well made nonetheless.

Room.Name: The Quartermaster's Hold
Room.Description: You are standing in what looks like an official's room with maps and charts designed to guide people to where they should be guided. There is a door leading back south.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading south out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading north out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading south out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading south out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading north out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading north out of the house.

Room.Name: The guard headquarters
Room.Description: This room is a sparse and uncomfortable guardhouse. It seems mostly that the locals provide the guard force here and they tend to live at home anyway.

Room.Name: The Lord Templar's Room
Room.Description: Beautiful plaques and rugs adorn this room making it seem more like a room of a prince than a humble servant of god. Yet the richness is surely well deserved or the dale people would hardly provide for such a man.

Room.Name: The High Cleric's Chamber
Room.Description: A very spartan and homely room. This has only the bare minimums for living in. A bed, desk and a window are the only items and they seem more for function than aesthetics.

Room.Name: A small alcove in the temple
Room.Description: You stand in a small side room of the temple where holy water has been set aside for those wishing to bless themselves before seeing the priest.

Room.Name: On a balcony overlooking the Dale
Room.Description: You stand upon a high wooden balcony set high above the house. From here the view is superb and allows you to glimpse much of the dale that was hidden by the thick woods surrounding it. Far off in the west you can make out fields and way off in the north is a dark ominous forest. The only exit is back east into the house.

Room.Name: The Lord's Private Study
Room.Description: You are standing within a rich and luxurious study. Much of it contains papers and documents relating to the governing of the propsperous daleland town and it is evident the lord takes his duties seriously.

Room.Name: A pathway through the township
Room.Description: You stand upon a well kept gravel path. Around you the thick forest provides a comforting cover from the rest of the world, and soft noises of animals can be heard. To the north is a small building, while east there is a large common square.

Room.Name: A pathway through the township
Room.Description: You stand upon a well kept gravel path. Around you the thick forest provides a comforting cover from the rest of the world, and soft noises of animals can be heard. To the north and south are some houses, while the pathway heads east and west.

Room.Name: A pathway through the western outskirts of Shadowdale
Room.Description: You stand upon a well kept gravel path. Around you the thick forest provides a comforting cover from the rest of the world, and soft noises of animals can be heard. The gravel path continues east and west.

Room.Name: Outside the western outskirts of Shadowdale
Room.Description: You stand upon a well kept gravel path. Around you the thick forest provides a comforting cover from the rest of the world, and soft noises of animals can be heard. The gravel path leads north towards some cultivated fields, and east to some houses.

Room.Name: The western outskirts of Shadowdale
Room.Description: You stand upon a well kept gravel path. Around you the thick forest provides a comforting cover from the rest of the world, and soft noises of animals can be heard. The gravel path leads north towards some cultivated fields, or south.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading west out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading west out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading east out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading north out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading south out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading south out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading east out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading west out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading west out of the house.

Room.Name: Before the dale fields
Room.Description: You are standing before some well cultivated fields. Small trails wind between them where farmers have trodden in order to tend and harvest their crops. The trails lead east and west through the fields, and a larger gravel pathway heads south away from the farming land.

Room.Name: In the dale fields
Room.Description: You stand amidst well kept farm fields filled with various crops and fruits. Long rows of vegetables have been planted side by side between small trails to allow easy harvesting. The fields continue north and west.

Room.Name: In the dale fields
Room.Description: You stand amidst well kept farm fields filled with various crops and fruits. Long rows of vegetables have been planted side by side between small trails to allow easy harvesting. The fields continue north and east.

Room.Name: In the dale fields
Room.Description: You stand amidst well kept farm fields filled with various crops and fruits. Long rows of vegetables have been planted side by side between small trails to allow easy harvesting. The fields continue north to a lake, east and south.

Room.Name: In the dale fields
Room.Description: You stand amidst well kept farm fields filled with various crops and fruits. Long rows of vegetables have been planted side by side between small trails to allow easy harvesting. The fields continue north to a lake, east and west.

Room.Name: In the dale fields
Room.Description: You stand amidst well kept farm fields filled with various crops and fruits. Long rows of vegetables have been planted side by side between small trails to allow easy harvesting. The fields continue north to a lake, south and west.

Room.Name: In the dale fields
Room.Description: You stand amidst well kept farm fields filled with various crops and fruits. Long rows of vegetables have been planted side by side between small trails to allow easy harvesting. The fields continue north, and east towards a lake.

Room.Name: Edge of a large lake in the fields
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a large lake amidst the dale farm fields. Water has been diverted from it to form shallow riverlets to water the crops. All about you the fields spread out.

Room.Name: Edge of a large lake in the fields
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a large lake amidst the dale farm fields. Water has been diverted from it to form shallow riverlets to water the crops. All about you the fields spread out.

Room.Name: Edge of a large lake in the fields
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a large lake amidst the dale farm fields. Water has been diverted from it to form shallow riverlets to water the crops. All about you the fields spread out.

Room.Name: In the dale fields
Room.Description: You stand amidst well kept farm fields filled with various crops and fruits. Long rows of vegetables have been planted side by side between small trails to allow easy harvesting. The fields continue north, and west towards a lake.

Room.Name: In the dale fields
Room.Description: You stand amidst well kept farm fields filled with various crops and fruits. Long rows of vegetables have been planted side by side between small trails to allow easy harvesting. The fields continue north, and east towards a lake.

Room.Name: Edge of a large lake in the fields
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a large lake amidst the dale farm fields. Water has been diverted from it to form shallow riverlets to water the crops. All about you the fields spread out.

Room.Name: Edge of a large lake in the fields
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a large lake amidst the dale farm fields. Water has been diverted from it to form shallow riverlets to water the crops. All about you the fields spread out.

Room.Name: In the dale fields
Room.Description: You stand amidst well kept farm fields filled with various crops and fruits. Long rows of vegetables have been planted side by side between small trails to allow easy harvesting. The fields continue north, south and west.

Room.Name: In the dale fields
Room.Description: You stand amidst well kept farm fields filled with various crops and fruits. Long rows of vegetables have been planted side by side between small trails to allow easy harvesting. The fields continue east and south.

Room.Name: Edge of a large lake in the fields
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a large lake amidst the dale farm fields. Water has been diverted from it to form shallow riverlets to water the crops. All about you the fields spread out.

Room.Name: Edge of a large lake in the fields
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a large lake amidst the dale farm fields. Water has been diverted from it to form shallow riverlets to water the crops. All about you the fields spread out.

Room.Name: Edge of a large lake in the fields
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a large lake amidst the dale farm fields. Water has been diverted from it to form shallow riverlets to water the crops. All about you the fields spread out.

Room.Name: In the dale fields
Room.Description: You stand amidst well kept farm fields filled with various crops and fruits. Long rows of vegetables have been planted side by side between small trails to allow easy harvesting. The fields continue south and west. To the east the trails lead off into a small grove of trees amidst the surrounding forest.

Room.Name: On the edge of a grove
Room.Description: You are standing at the very edge of a small grove of trees amidst the forest surrounding the dale. To the west the local farm fields lay spread out, and to the east the grove continues into the forests.

Room.Name: On a path in the northern dale
Room.Description: You are standing at the very northern end of the dale. All around you the forest looms forebodingly and cloaks everything in shadows. East of here you can make out a dense and dark forest.

Room.Name: A path through the forest
Room.Description: You stand on a narrow but well kept trail through the thick woods. The sounds of animals resound all about you and leaves rustle softly in the wind. Above you the high tree top canopy blocks out much of the sun, making the region seem darker than it really is. To the west you can hear the faint sounds of water splashing. The path leads into a T-junction to the east.

Room.Name: A muddy path through the forest
Room.Description: You are on a damp and muddy section of the forest path. The path heads south to a bend and towards what sounds like water, or east to drier parts.

Room.Name: On a muddy bank before the lake
Room.Description: You find yourself on the banks of a large lake. Water sloshes at your feet and the trees overhead hang heavily above it as if protecting the water. Around the lake you can make out the figures of people fishing and talking. A path heads north away from the river, or west to the edges of it.

Room.Name: On the edge of the fishing lake
Room.Description: You are walking around the edge of a large lake filled with murky water. The muddy path is slippery and hazardous but it hasn't prevented many people from coming here to fish for their dinner. The lake heads north and west.

Room.Name: On the edge of the fishing lake
Room.Description: You are walking around the edge of a large lake filled with murky water. The muddy path is slippery and hazardous but it hasn't prevented many people from coming here to fish for their dinner. The lake heads east and west.

Room.Name: On the edge of the fishing lake
Room.Description: You are walking around the edge of a large lake filled with murky water. The muddy path is slippery and hazardous but it hasn't prevented many people from coming here to fish for their dinner. The lake heads north and east.

Room.Name: On the edge of the fishing lake
Room.Description: You are walking around the edge of a large lake filled with murky water. The muddy path is slippery and hazardous but it hasn't prevented many people from coming here to fish for their dinner. The lake heads north and south.

Room.Name: On the edge of the fishing lake
Room.Description: You are walking around the edge of a large lake filled with murky water. The muddy path is slippery and hazardous but it hasn't prevented many people from coming here to fish for their dinner. The lake heads east and south.

Room.Name: In a small outpost
Room.Description: You are standing in a small wooden outpost designed for housing local guards as they are sent to watch over people entering the dale from the south. The room gives a good view of the bridge east and has arror slots for easy firing at any invaders. There is very little else of interest here.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading north out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading south out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading south out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading south out of the house.

Room.Name: On the edge of the fishing lake
Room.Description: You are walking around the edge of a large lake filled with murky water. The muddy path is slippery and hazardous but it hasn't prevented many people from coming here to fish for their dinner. The lake heads east and west.

Room.Name: On the edge of the fishing lake
Room.Description: You are walking around the edge of a large lake filled with murky water. The muddy path is slippery and hazardous but it hasn't prevented many people from coming here to fish for their dinner. The lake heads south and west.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading west out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading west out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading east out of the house.

Room.Name: A small house
Room.Description: You find yourself within a small but tidy house. The main room is large and comfortable with a homely feeling about it. Small partitions seperate the house into bedrooms and a couple of windows are set into the sides to provide a view of the beautiful forests. There is a door leading east out of the house.

Room.Name: Within the Dale inn
Room.Description: You are standing in a smoke filled, noisy inn. Patrons stagger about and yell to one another while other curse them and yell for them to go to the tavern next door.

Room.Name: In a small grove
Room.Description: You stand within a secluded grove of trees nestled between the farming fields to the west and the forest around the dale. Dark shadows converge all around and obscure your view of what lies beyond.

Room.Name: In a small grove
Room.Description: You are within a quiet and dark grove nestled within the dale. Overhead the trees cast deep and disturbing shadows upon you and obscure the pathway. All around you the air seems very still.

Room.Name: In a small grove
Room.Description: You are within a quiet and dark grove nestled within the dale. Overhead the trees cast deep and disturbing shadows upon you and obscure the pathway. All around you the air seems very still. To the east the grove seems very dark and foreboding. Peering into it you can't make out anything, not even an end to the trees...

Room.Name: In a small grove
Room.Description: You are within a quiet and dark grove nestled within the dale. Overhead the trees cast deep and disturbing shadows upon you and obscure the pathway. All around you the air seems very still. All around you the grove seems to lead into nothing but identical clearings.

Room.Name: In a small grove
Room.Description: You are within a quiet and dark grove nestled within the dale. Overhead the trees cast deep and disturbing shadows upon you and obscure the pathway. All around you the air seems very still. All around you the grove seems to lead into nothing but identical clearings.

Room.Name: In a small grove
Room.Description: You are within a quiet and dark grove nestled within the dale. Overhead the trees cast deep and disturbing shadows upon you and obscure the pathway. All around you the air seems very still. All around you the grove seems to lead into nothing but identical clearings.

Room.Name: In a small grove
Room.Description: You are within a quiet and dark grove nestled within the dale. Overhead the trees cast deep and disturbing shadows upon you and obscure the pathway. All around you the air seems very still. All around you the grove seems to lead into nothing but identical clearings.

Room.Name: In a small grove
Room.Description: You are within a quiet and dark grove nestled within the dale. Overhead the trees cast deep and disturbing shadows upon you and obscure the pathway. All around you the air seems very still. All around you the grove seems to lead into nothing but identical clearings.

Room.Name: In a small grove
Room.Description: You are within a quiet and dark grove nestled within the dale. Overhead the trees cast deep and disturbing shadows upon you and obscure the pathway. All around you the air seems very still. All around you the grove seems to lead into nothing but identical clearings.

Room.Name: Before a strange marble tower
Room.Description: You are suddenly standing before a small tower made of marble. It is hard to determine it's purpose since there are no windows of any sort and the only distinguishing feature on it's smooth surface is an oak door leading east into it. To the west you can see a dark and brooding grove.

Room.Name: Inside the marble tower
Room.Description: The inside of the tower is even smaller than it looks on the outside. From here it seems almost like a single room. You somehow get the feeling that it is not normally like this, but is more a reaction to your prescence and that you are unwanted here...there is an oak door leading west outside, and a staircase leading up into the tower.

Room.Name: A small room in the marble tower
Room.Description: You are within a tiny bare room. It seems that the tower is almost shrinking as you go into it, as if trying to get rid of you. The only way out is a door in the east wall.

Room.Name: Second floor of the marble tower
Room.Description: You are in a small marble room which seems almost too small to be liveable. Nothing is here at all, not even a window. You get a strange feeling you are not wanted here, as if the tower is shrinking on you in order to make you leave. Doors lie in the east and west walls, and a staircase heads up and down through the tower.

Room.Name: A small room in the marble tower
Room.Description: You are within a tiny bare room. It seems that the tower is almost shrinking as you go into it, as if trying to get rid of you. The only way out is a door in the west wall.

Room.Name: In a tiny room of the marble tower
Room.Description: You stand in a tiny room of marble, barely large enough to stand in. The tower almost seems to shrink as you go further into it, as if not wanting you here. A staircase heads down and up, but the way up shrinks so severely that it is quite impossible to go through it. There is a single door in the south wall that seems to tingle with magic.

Room.Name: Darokin's Observation room
Room.Description: This room is huge. Unlike the rest of the tower outside this room is built for accomodation and comfort. The walls seem opaque and shimmer with magic of incredible power. Very briefly images flicker across them, images of places far away. The only exit is north out the door.

Room.Name: On the edge of the fishing lake
Room.Description: You are walking around the edge of a large lake filled with murky water. The muddy path is slippery and hazardous but it hasn't prevented many people from coming here to fish for their dinner. To the east the lake heads onto a narrow forest path.

Room.Name: A Gravel Path between Shadowdale and the Shadowlands
Room.Description: You stand upon a gravel path covered in swirling fog. The hills and plains are obscured in all directions by a constant shadow. Somewhere in the haze, a solitary scream can be heard drifting in like a distant ghost.

Room.Name: A Gravel Path between Shadowdale and the Shadowlands
Room.Description: You stand upon a gravel path covered in swirling fog. The hills and plains are obscured in all directions by a constant shadow. Somewhere in the haze, a solitary scream can be heard drifting in like a distant ghost.

Room.Name: A Gravel Path between Shadowdale and the Shadowlands
Room.Description: You stand upon a gravel path covered in swirling fog. The hills and plains are obscured in all directions by a constant shadow. Somewhere in the haze, a solitary scream can be heard drifting in like a distant ghost.

NPC.name: elminster man mage
NPC.description: This old man is the archmage of many planes. He travels extensively and has more knowledge than almost any other mortal being. Although old and seemingly feeble his power should never be underestimated. Right now he is busy trying to unravel a mystery related to the darkness that has begun to encompass the northern parts of Orthos.
NPC.longDescription: A timeless man stands here watching the world pass by.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: guard man
NPC.description: The is man is watching the area with vigilance and, unlike many guardsmen, seems to actually be doing it with purpose. For this guard peace in the dale means peace in his home, for the dale is his home.
NPC.longDescription: A tall guard is here watching over the dale people.

NPC.name: watchman man
NPC.description: This guard has the badges of a higher ranking sergeant in the dale militia. His steel ring is a symbol of his rank and responsibility to the people.
NPC.longDescription: A large watchman stands guard over the township.

NPC.name: woman citizen
NPC.description: This young woman seems almost oblivious to you, although she does glance at you out of the corner of her eye in interest.
NPC.longDescription: A young woman is here mingling with her neighbours.

NPC.name: man citizen
NPC.description: A local man just on the prowl for more liquor or women. He doesn't seem too bright but he appears content.
NPC.longDescription: A man is here wandering through his local township.

NPC.name: minstrel elf bard
NPC.description: This elf is strumming tunes to help liven up the market and bring in more people. He's also getting a nice commision and some generous tips from listeners.
NPC.longDescription: An elven minstrel is here playing his music to all who listen.

NPC.name: man owner
NPC.description: This man appears very bored. He probably wants to be in the local inn or tavern than at home fixing things.
NPC.longDescription: A bored looking man is here tending his house.

NPC.name: man owner
NPC.description: This man looks you over in suspicion before returning to fix up his house against robbers and intruders such as yourself!
NPC.longDescription: A man is here making sure his house is safe.

NPC.name: woman owner
NPC.description: This lady doesn't seem to know what to make of strangers just walking in on her like this. She regards you with a frown but knows there is little she can do, and thus returns to making her meal.
NPC.longDescription: A woman preparing a meal takes time to glance at you in suspicion.

NPC.name: familiar imp
NPC.description: This horrible scaly creature flaps it's leathery wings and grins. It seems that the archmage that summoned it has left it to it's own devices for now.
NPC.longDescription: A horrible little imp grins at you and snaps it's teeth.

NPC.name: inkeeper man
NPC.description: The inkeeper raises and eyebrow at you attention and indictes he's waiting for your order.
NPC.longDescription: A burly inkeeper is here taking orders for drink and food.

NPC.name: armorer man blacksmith
NPC.description: The dwarf grunts as he hammers steel into armor. Sweat runs freely down his face but he seems very content with his work.
NPC.longDescription: A strong dwarven blacksmith is here hammering some steel into form.

NPC.name: weaponsmith dwarf
NPC.description: This stocky dwarf looks over a blade in his hands and smiles a smile that only a true creator could understand.
NPC.longDescription: A weaponsmith is here testing a newly tempered blade.

NPC.name: magic owner man
NPC.description: This man was a failed apprentice of the Arcana. He knows minor magics but never managed to become more than passingly proficient. Now he spends his time peddling off shoddy magical gear to any who will buy.
NPC.longDescription: A man in blue robes is here selling some of his magical wares.

NPC.name: barmaid girl woman
NPC.description: This young girl looks almost too young to be serving drinks. She was plainly hired for her looks rather than her ability since she seems to be spilling quite a lot as she dodges the hands of drunken customers.
NPC.longDescription: A young girl is here serving drinks.

NPC.name: patron man
NPC.longDescription: A drunken man is here glaring at everyone through reddened eyes.

NPC.name: man
NPC.description: This man seems impatient. He's waiting for the quartermaster to let him through to sell his wares, but the quartermaster appears to be out to lunch.
NPC.longDescription: A man is here watching over a cart of his produce.

NPC.name: fisherman man
NPC.longDescription: A local man is here playing with some line and tackle.

NPC.name: deer
NPC.longDescription: A deer is here munching idly upon the grasses.

NPC.name: rabbit
NPC.longDescription: A small rabbit is here peering at you with apprehension.

NPC.name: farmer man
NPC.description: This man is here trying to make a living from the land. He's not trained in anything special, or knowledgable, but he is the lifeblood of the dale. This is where the real dale gets it's life from, the crops it produces.
NPC.longDescription: A farmer is here watching over his crops.

NPC.name: boy farmhand man
NPC.description: This local boy seems less interested in tending the fields than getting some time to relax.
NPC.longDescription: A boy is standing around trying to look busy amidst the fields.

NPC.name: horse
NPC.longDescription: A horse attached to a cart is here.

NPC.name: templar
NPC.description: This knight templar has the bearing of royalty. He hails from a nearby city and is on leave to survey the operation of local clergy. Right now he appears to be communing with his deity, or at least pretending to.
NPC.longDescription: A powerful looking knight is here practising his prayers.

NPC.name: child boy
NPC.description: This boy plays blissfully unaware of you.
NPC.longDescription: A young boy is here playing on the floor.

NPC.name: child girl
NPC.description: This girl looks back at you in interest, a small sparkle in her eyes before she turns away shyly.
NPC.longDescription: A girl is here watching you with inquisitive eyes.

NPC.name: healer priest cleric
NPC.description: This old adventurer has now retired and, like many clerics, has turned to the more mundane task of providing community healing.
NPC.longDescription: A cleric is here offering his healing services.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Cleric Warrior Healer AreaAttack

NPC.name: lord
NPC.description: The Lord of the dale is a powerful ex-adventruer who earned his fame and power from many years of fighting. His reputation in the local region as a fighter is unsurpassed and it is even rumoured he has learned some minor magic from his friend Elminster.
NPC.longDescription: A stern looking man is here working hard in his study.

NPC.name: banker
NPC.longDescription: A portly looking banker is here serving people.

NPC.name: clother woman seamtress
NPC.description: This woman is desperately trying to make more clothes for her stock before she opens shop. She seems quite worn out.
NPC.longDescription: An elegantly dressed woman is here trying to make clothes.

NPC.name: woman clother
NPC.longDescription: A young woman is here selling the shops clothing.

NPC.name: tavernkeeper man
NPC.longDescription: A tavernkeeper is here selling to his demanding customers.

NPC.name: baker
NPC.longDescription: The dale baker is here making some hot breads.

NPC.name: captain guard
NPC.description: This giant is a dedicated and experienced guardsman, and ex-adventurer now turned enforcer.
NPC.longDescription: The captain of the dale guard is here making sure things look in order.
NPC.shortDescription: Jason the captain of the guard
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: knight guard man
NPC.description: This knight is one of the legendary knights of Myth Drannor, dedicated to protecting the forests of Myth Drannor from looters and would-be visitors.
NPC.longDescription: A tall knight stands here guarding the path to the forests beyond.

Item.Name: sign signpost
Item.LongDescription: Planted in the ground is a signpost reading 'Welcome to Greenleaf dale'.

ExtraDescription.Description: It reads: "Welcome to Greenleaf dale, home of peace and tolerance to all races".

Item.Name: sign signpost
Item.LongDescription: A small signpost is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It reads: North -- To Myth Drannor. East -- The Greenleaf dale market and temple. West -- Fields. All traders must talk to the quarter master to the east before taking goods into the market.

Item.Name: sign signpost
Item.LongDescription: A worn sign rests here in the muddy ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sign reads: The Forests of Myth Drannor beyond this point to the east are dangerous lands leading to deadly lands. Any who pass beyond this point are not guaranteed safe passage. It is signed, Knights of Myth Drannor.

Item.Name: well
Item.LongDescription: A large open well has been dug into the ground here.

Item.Name: fountain
Item.LongDescription: A large well has been built here for all.

Item.Name: steel plate armor platemail
Item.LongDescription: A set of steel plate armor is on the ground.

Item.Name: steel gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: A set of steel gauntlets lie here unused.

Item.Name: dale helmet helm
Item.LongDescription: A finely made helmet lies upon the ground.

Item.Name: leggings iron
Item.LongDescription: A pair of strong iron leggings lie here.

Item.Name: steel sleeves
Item.LongDescription: A set of steel sleeves are on the floor.

Item.Name: steel sword longsword
Item.LongDescription: A fine steel longsword is lying on the ground.

Item.Name: daleforged dale-forged dale mace
Item.LongDescription: A large mace has been left on the floor here.

Item.Name: fine dagger
Item.LongDescription: A finely made dagger is on the ground.

Item.Name: flail
Item.LongDescription: A flail with two lengths of corded steel lies on the ground.

Item.Name: arcane Darokin hat
Item.ShortDescription: a hat covered in arcane symbols
Item.LongDescription: A large floppy hat covered in strange symbols is on the ground.

ExtraDescription.Description: This wide brimmed hat looks silly but the runes inscribed on it are of the highest powers. It once belonged to the archmage Darokin of Greenleaf dale and perhaps he will come looking for it someday...

Item.Name: archmagi robes robe
Item.LongDescription: A large robe of swirling energy lies here.

Item.Name: jug beer
Item.LongDescription: A large jug of beer is here slowly warming up.

Item.Name: mug ale
Item.LongDescription: A mug of frothing ale is here.

Item.Name: dwarf ale
Item.LongDescription: A mug of powerful dwarf ale is here.

Item.Name: shot flaming dragon spirits
Item.ShortDescription: a shot of flaming dragon spirits
Item.LongDescription: A small shot of flaming dragon spirit is on the floor.

Item.Name: orc breath
Item.LongDescription: A shot of vile looking alcohol is on the ground.

Item.Name: cart
Item.LongDescription: A large farmer's cart filled with produce is here.

Item.Name: apple
Item.LongDescription: A ripe, fresh apple is lying here.

Item.Name: steel longsword sword
Item.LongDescription: A superbly crafted steel longsword has been left here.

Item.Name: steel mithril-lined shield
Item.LongDescription: A perfect steel shield with mithril lining is here.

Item.Name: fine steel sleeves
Item.ShortDescription: A set of fine steel sleeves
Item.LongDescription: A pair of steel sleeves of superior make lie here.

Item.Name: green tunic
Item.LongDescription: A tunic colored in forest green is here.

Item.Name: leather boots
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of soft leather boots
Item.LongDescription: A pair of soft leather boots is here.

Item.Name: camoflauge poncho
Item.LongDescription: A poncho colored in forest green is here.

Item.Name: potion blue
Item.LongDescription: A potion of blue liquid is here.

Item.Name: green potion
Item.LongDescription: A pale green potion lies on the ground.

Item.Name: wand silver
Item.LongDescription: A silver handled wand lies on the ground.

Item.Name: rod black
Item.LongDescription: A black rod is on the floor here.

Item.Name: bread
Item.LongDescription: A loaf of bread is lying here.

Item.Name: pie
Item.LongDescription: A steaming hot pie is on the floor.

Item.Name: donut
Item.LongDescription: A delicious looking donut is on the ground.

Item.Name: apple
Item.LongDescription: A large fresh apple is on the ground.

Item.Name: meal
Item.LongDescription: A hot meal has been dropped here.

Item.Name: leather boots
Item.LongDescription: A pair of leather boots are on the ground.

Item.Name: white dress
Item.LongDescription: A well made white dress is on the ground.

Item.Name: suit black
Item.LongDescription: A finely stitched black suit is on the floor.

Item.Name: steel ring
Item.LongDescription: A ring of prefectly smooth steel lies on the ground.

Item.Name: white cloth cape
Item.ShortDescription: a cape of pure white cloth
Item.LongDescription: A piece of white cloth has been dropped on the floor.

Item.Name: silver belt
Item.LongDescription: A beautiful belt buckle lies on the ground.

Item.Name: steel buckler shield
Item.LongDescription: A large steel buckler is on the ground.

Item.Name: ivory steel sword longsword
Item.LongDescription: A large sword with an ivory hilt is on the ground.
